metadata.title: CVE-2024-38562 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: nl80211: Avoid address calculations via out of bounds array indexingBefore request->channels[] can be used, request->n_channels must be set.Additionally, address calculations for memory after the "channels" arrayneed to be calculated from the allocation base ("request") rather thanvia the first "out of bounds" index of "channels", otherwise run-timebounds checking will throw a warning.
